Package net.kyori.adventure.platform.bukkit

package net.kyori.adventure.platform.bukkit
Compatibility layer for legacy Bukkit-based servers.

For modern Minecraft versions, Paper or another plugin platform should be used instead.

  • Class
    Description
    BukkitAudiences
    An audience provider for Bukkit.
    BukkitAudiences.Builder
    A builder for BukkitAudiences.
    BukkitComponentSerializer
    A pair of component serializers for Bukkit.
    MinecraftComponentSerializer
    A component serializer for net.minecraft.server.<version>.IChatBaseComponent.
